definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: twist (so Targum [[סְרַח]] (= Heb. [[עִוׇּה]], [[עִוֵּה]]); perhaps akin to [[שׂרג]], [[סרג]]; Talm. [[סָרַח]] is adhere, cf. Aram. srak, srek; Ar. 4araka is share, participate, but 4ara9ah;un sandal-thong, 4ara0kun snare);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pt. fs. [[מְשָׂרֶכֶת דְּרָכֶיהָ]] Je 2:23 a swift dromedary entangling her ways (galloping aimlessly; fig.).
